mapper.select: SELECT pd.dim_property_id, p.property_key, dd.date_id FROM ( SELECT dim_property_id, min(dim_date_id) min_date_id FROM Fact_web_performance_cumulative WHERE dim_date_id >= #{since} AND #{until} > dim_date_id GROUP BY dim_property_id ) AS pd JOIN Dim_date dd ON dd.date_id >= pd.min_date_id AND #{until} >= dd.date_id LEFT JOIN Fact_web_performance_cumulative ffc ON pd.dim_property_id = ffc.dim_property_id AND dd.date_id = ffc.dim_date_id JOIN Dim_property p ON pd.dim_property_id = p.property_id WHERE ffc.dim_date_id IS NULL ORDER BY date_id DESC, dim_property_id
